title: Exquisite Jadau Haaram with Emeralds and Sapphires
features: Intricately crafted Jadau setting showcasing the brilliance of uncut Polki diamonds. Features alternating rows of carved emeralds and diamond-studded floral motifs along the neckline. The central pendant is a larger emerald surrounded by elaborate diamond detailing, leading to delicate sapphire bead drops. The gold setting is handcrafted using traditional South Indian Nakshi work techniques.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds
and the dazzling white of Polki diamonds. A classic Telugu color palette for auspicious occasions.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A statement piece that effortlessly elevates any festive or formal attire.
description: A truly unique and heirloom-worthy Jadau Haaram. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the combination of emeralds, sapphires, and Polki diamonds creates a stunning visual impact. The exquisite craftsmanship ensures longevity and enduring value. This piece embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry, making it a prized possession for generations to come.
